summary: From the RPG, Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning, is the sultry Dokkalfar assassin, Alyn Shir.
descriptionHtml:
The Dokkalfar assassin, Alyn Shir, is cunning and tricky. A Dokkalfar is what Nirn-dwellers call a Dark Elf. She is dangerously beautiful and has a silver tongue, she utilizes them with lethal efficiency. When diplomacy fails, she carries two daggers to flay her enemies to bits. 

﻿The mods used for her creation were KS Hairdos- Lite and CBBE, all fine touches made in RaceMenu. 

﻿If you're a fan of the game as I am, and should you decide to roleplay as this fine character. Here are a few suggestions:
﻿ ﻿-Dual Wield Daggers
﻿ ﻿-Sneak and Speechcraft
﻿ ﻿-Light Armor (of course)
﻿ ﻿-Invisibility Potions/Spell (choice Alchemy or Illusion)

This mod was inspired by "jmenaru's Alyn Shir Armor - CBBEv3 - UNP - UNP - BBP".

 ﻿If you like the preset and would like to see any other Skyrim adaptations of fictional characters, comment and/or endorse this mod. (Preferably both)
author: CadmiumChord
